welcome_message_body: Welcome to Athis-Mons, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring everything this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal Sud
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Ouest
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) and serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
